vacancies.title: General Vacancies/Interns
vacancies.description:
LLC FINA hires only the best. People who thrive in a culture of innovation and empowerment. People who are active learners and have a positive attitude. People who are leaders and know that by working together we can run faster, reach higher and achieve more.

We are looking for a creative persons, who are interested in joining our team as an interns. This is a paid internship where you will gain in-depth skills in our tech stack that will take you further to success. It provides students a valuable experience with real world applications while being able to work a part-time, flexible schedule to fit your educational needs.

What We Look For:
  • You must be able to commute to our office during the internship
  • Ability to quickly learn new technologies
  • Have a natural curiosity to dig into a problem or task until completed
During your internship, you will be mentored by a senior members of the LLC FINA team and receive regular feedback as to your performance highlighting your successes and potential areas for growth.

Based on company needs and your evaluation, you may be considered for continuing internship or full-time employment opportunities upon graduation.

If you think, that you are awesome enough and you want to become a professional
  • .NET Developer
  • Java Developer
  • System Integrator
  • Business Analyst
weâ€™re looking forward to meeting you !

Interested candidates, please submit an online application and attach your CV.

vacancies.title: ERP Consultant (Internship)
vacancies.description:
Responsibilities:
  • Providing consulting services on business management and accounting software;
  • Prepare and make presentations to potential clients according to different fields;
  • Participate in the process of introducing new software and perform implementation-related work;
  • Analyze customer requirements, prepare technical assignments or / and make changes; Identify customer needs and proactively support;
  • Documentary operations;
  • Reporting;
  • Support for the project implementation team;
  • Participate in trainings provided by the internship program;
  • Perform other work-related tasks.

vacancies.title: Java Developer

vacancies.title: QA Tester

  • Preparation of test templates / documents;
  • Drawing and implementing test scenarios.

vacancies.title: Assistant Finance Director
vacancies.description:

- Managing correspondence and documentation management;

Mandatory requirements(which actually means mandatory;):

vacancies.title: .Net Developer
vacancies.description:
Company FINA LLC announces a vacancy for the position of .Net Developer

Knowledge of the following technologies:
  -  At least 2 year experience in web development Microsoft .NET technology
  -  Knowledge of Russian and English is desired

Knowledge of the following technologies will be preferable:
  -  Asp.NET MVC/Razor View Engine
  -  Asp.NET Web Forms
  -  JavaScript/JQuery
  -  ExtJS
  -  SQL/TSQL Query Language
  -  Ability to analyze Execution Plans and optimization SQL Scripts
  -  Experience in Ext.NET

The candidate must have solid understanding OOP programming and the SOLID principles.
Experience in design patterns and understanding Multi Tier architecture.

Interested candidates, please fill in the Application Form and attach your CV. We Offer:*** Permanent professional development.*** The possibility of working with international projects. (USAID, WB, GIZ, UNDP...)*** Working with Agile qualified team members and a friendly working environment.
Interested candidates, please fill in the Application Form and attach your CV.
vacancies.shortDescription:
Company FINA LLC announces a vacancy for the position of .Net Developer

Knowledge of the following technologies:
  -  At least 2 year experience in web development Microsoft .NET technology
  -  Knowledge of Russian and English is desired

vacancies.title: Project Manager
vacancies.description:
Company FINA LLC announces a vacancy for the position of Project Manager

Responsibilities:
  • Management and responsibility of implementation for IT projects including technical implementation of IT solutions.
  • Independent planning and implementation of national/local and international IT projects.
  • Project management and consultation within the technology area of profession.
  • Planning and implementation of IT solutions through analytical descriptive data and procedure, including communication structures and tools.

Requirements:
  • Strong written and spoken Russian and English language skills.
  • Knowledge of MS Project, Jira, Confluence, Visio, Excel, Word and PowerPoint.
  • Preferable experience of managing Database.
  • Knowledge of both theoretical and practical aspects of project management.

We offer you:
  • Personal and professional development.
  • Working with members of the qualified Agile team.
  • Opportunity to work on multilateral projects with international and prestigious organizations. (World Bank, USAID, UNDP etc.)
  • Attractive salary and positive working atmosphere.
vacancies.shortDescription:
Job Description:
- Management and responsibility of implementation for IT projects including technical implementation of IT solutions.
- Independent planning and implementation of national/local and international IT projects.
- Project management and consultation within the technology area of profession.
- Planning and implementation of IT solutions through analytical descriptive data and procedure, including communication structures and tools.

vacancies.title: Business Analyst
vacancies.description:
Job Description:
- Identification and analysis of business requirements, review existing processes and systems;
- Preparation of project documentation for development, implementeton and functionality purposes
- Engage in existing projects management;
- Supporting functional testing of software and analyzing results with test team
- Prepare / modify standards based on business requirements;
- Analysis of new projects and drawing up a proper technical task for developers;
- Use of company standards in the process of clarification (JIRA)
Requirements:
- A minimum of 2 years experience in business analysis or a related field;
- A history of leading and supporting successful projects;
- Experience leading and developing top performing teams;
- Competency in MS OFFICE;
